attributes.action: Stop funding public information films "adverts" on comercial television stations - when the BBC could benefit from the revenue instead of recieving so called subsidies.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Why line shareholders pockets of Television companies, when the numerous "public information films" for a plethora of nanny state, tax, licences, health, driving, drinking, smoking, fire warnings etc etc and even at Christmas on how to cook a turkey! Could be shown (if neccessary on BBC television. Thus keeping the public's money in the public's sector.
